name: ACTION_ACCESSIBILITY_SETTINGS
action: Show settings for accessibility modules.

name: ACTION_ADD_ACCOUNT
action: Show add account screen for creating a new account.

name: ACTION_AIRPLANE_MODE_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow entering/exiting airplane mode.

name: ACTION_ALL_APPS_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS
action: Show app listing settings, filtered by those that send notifications.

name: ACTION_APN_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of APNs.

name: ACTION_APPLICATION_DETAILS_SETTINGS
action: Show screen of details about a particular application.

name: ACTION_APPLICATION_DEVELOPMENT_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of application development-related settings.

name: ACTION_APPLICATION_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of application-related settings.

name: ACTION_APP_LOCALE_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of per application locale.

name: ACTION_APP_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS
action: Show notification settings for a single app.

name: ACTION_APP_OPEN_BY_DEFAULT_SETTINGS
action: Show the "Open by Default" page in a particular application's details page. In some cases, a matching Activity may not exist, so ensure you safeguard against this.

name: ACTION_APP_SEARCH_SETTINGS
action: Show Settings app search UI when this action is available for device.

name: ACTION_APP_USAGE_SETTINGS
action: Show screen for controlling app usage properties for an app.

name: ACTION_AUTO_ROTATE_SETTINGS
action: Show Auto Rotate configuration settings.

name: ACTION_BIOMETRIC_ENROLL
action: Show settings to enroll biometrics, and setup PIN/Pattern/Pass if necessary. By default, this prompts the user to enroll biometrics with strength Weak or above, as defined by the CDD. Only biometrics that meet or exceed Strong, as defined in the CDD are allowed to participate in Keystore operations.

name: ACTION_BATTERY_SAVER_SETTINGS
action: Show battery saver settings.

name: ACTION_BLUETOOTH_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of Bluetooth.

name: ACTION_CAPTIONING_SETTINGS
action: Show settings for video captioning.

name: ACTION_CAST_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of cast endpoints.

name: ACTION_CHANNEL_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS
action: Show notification settings for a single NotificationChannel. (DEMO)

name: ACTION_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SETTINGS
action: Show the automatic do not disturb rule listing page. Users can add, enable, disable, and remove automatic do not disturb rules from this screen. See NotificationManager#addAutomaticZenRule(AutomaticZenRule) for more details.

name: ACTION_DATA_ROAMING_SETTINGS
action: Show settings for selection of 2G/3G.

name: ACTION_DATE_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of date and time.

name: ACTION_DATA_USAGE_SETTINGS
action: In some cases, a matching Activity may not exist, so ensure you safeguard against this.

name: ACTION_DEVICE_INFO_SETTINGS
action: Show general device information settings (serial number, software version, phone number, etc.).

name: ACTION_DISPLAY_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of display.

name: ACTION_DREAM_SETTINGS
action: Show Daydream settings.

name: ACTION_DREAM_SETTINGS
action: Show Daydream settings.

name: ACTION_FINGERPRINT_ENROLL
action: Show settings to enroll fingerprints, and setup PIN/Pattern/Pass if necessary.

name: ACTION_HARD_KEYBOARD_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to configure the hardware keyboard.

name: ACTION_HOME_SETTINGS
action: Show Home selection settings. If there are multiple activities that can satisfy the CATEGORY_HOME intent, this screen allows you to pick your preferred activity.

name: ACTION_IGNORE_BACKGROUND_DATA_RESTRICTIONS_SETTINGS
action: Show screen for controlling background data restrictions for a particular application.

name: ACTION_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS
action: Show screen for controlling which apps can ignore battery optimizations.

name: ACTION_INPUT_METHOD_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to configure input methods, in particular allowing the user to enable input methods.

name: ACTION_INPUT_METHOD_SUBTYPE_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to enable/disable input method subtypes.

name: ACTION_INTERNAL_STORAGE_SETTINGS
action: Show settings for internal storage.

name: ACTION_LOCALE_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of locale.

name: ACTION_LOCATION_SOURCE_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of current location sources.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_ALL_APPLICATIONS_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to manage all applications.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_ALL_FILES_ACCESS_PERMISSION
action: Show screen for controlling which apps have access to manage external storage. In some cases, a matching Activity may not exist, so ensure you safeguard against this. If you want to control a specific app's access to manage external storage, use ACTION_MANAGE_APP_ALL_FILES_ACCESS_PERMISSION instead.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_ALL_SIM_PROFILES_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to manage all SIM profiles. In some cases, a matching Activity may not exist, so ensure you safeguard against this.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_APPLICATIONS_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to manage installed applications.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_APP_ALL_FILES_ACCESS_PERMISSION
action: Show screen for controlling if the app specified in the data URI of the intent can manage external storage. Launching the corresponding activity requires the permission Manifest.permission#MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE. In some cases, a matching Activity may not exist, so ensure you safeguard against this.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_DEFAULT_APPS_SETTINGS
action: Show Default apps settings.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_OVERLAY_PERMISSION
action: Show screen for controlling which apps can draw on top of other apps.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_SUPERVISOR_RESTRICTED_SETTING
action: Launch UI to manage a setting restricted by supervisors.

name: ACTION_MANAGE_UNKNOWN_APP_SOURCES
action: Show settings to allow configuration of trusted external sources

name: ACTION_MANAGE_WRITE_SETTINGS
action: Show screen for controlling which apps are allowed to write/modify system settings.

name: ACTION_MEMORY_CARD_SETTINGS
action: Show settings for memory card storage.

name: ACTION_NETWORK_OPERATOR_SETTINGS
action: Show settings for selecting the network operator.

name: ACTION_NFCSHARING_SETTINGS
action: Show NFC Sharing settings. This shows UI that allows NDEF Push (Android Beam) to be turned on or off.

name: ACTION_NFC_PAYMENT_SETTINGS
action: Show NFC Tap & Pay settings. This shows UI that allows the user to configure Tap&Pay settings.

name: ACTION_NFC_SETTINGS
action: Show NFC settings. This shows UI that allows NFC to be turned on or off.

name: ACTION_NIGHT_DISPLAY_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of Night display.

name: ACTION_NOTIFICATION_ASSISTANT_SETTINGS
action: Show Notification assistant settings.

name: ACTION_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_DETAIL_SETTINGS
action: Show notification listener permission settings page for app. Users can grant and deny access to notifications for a ComponentName from here. See NotificationManager.isNotificationListenerAccessGranted(ComponentName) for more details.

name: ACTION_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SETTINGS
action: Show Notification listener settings.

name: ACTION_NOTIFICATION_POLICY_ACCESS_SETTINGS
action: Show Do Not Disturb access settings. Users can grant and deny access to Do Not Disturb configuration from here. See isNotificationPolicyAccessGranted() for more details.

name: ACTION_PRINT_SETTINGS
action: Show the top level print settings.

name: ACTION_PRIVACY_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of privacy options.

name: ACTION_PROCESS_WIFI_EASY_CONNECT_URI
action: Show setting page to process a Wi-Fi Easy Connect (aka DPP) URI and start configuration. This intent should be used when you want to use this device to take on the configurator role for an IoT/other device. When provided with a valid DPP URI string, Settings will open a Wi-Fi selection screen for the user to indicate which network they would like to configure the device specified in the DPP URI string and carry them through the rest of the flow for provisioning the device. In some cases, a matching Activity may not exist, so ensure to safeguard against this by checking WifiManager#isEasyConnectSupported().

name: ACTION_QUICK_ACCESS_WALLET_SETTINGS
action: Show screen for controlling the Quick Access Wallet. In some cases, a matching Activity may not exist, so ensure you safeguard against this.

name: ACTION_QUICK_LAUNCH_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of quick launch shortcuts.

name: ACTION_REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS
action: Ask the user to allow an app to ignore battery optimizations (that is, put them on the whitelist of apps shown by ACTION_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS). For an app to use this, it also must hold the REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS permission.

name: ACTION_REQUEST_MANAGE_MEDIA
action: Activity Action: Show screen that let user select its Autofill Service.

name: ACTION_REQUEST_SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM
action: Show settings to allow configuration of Manifest.permission#SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM permission.

name: ACTION_REQUEST_SET_AUTOFILL_SERVICE
action: Activity Action: Show screen that let user select its Autofill Service.

name: ACTION_SEARCH_SETTINGS
action: Show settings for global search.

name: ACTION_SECURITY_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of security and location privacy.

name: ACTION_SETTINGS
action: Show system settings.

name: ACTION_SETTINGS_EMBED_DEEP_LINK_ACTIVITY
action: For system or preinstalled apps to show their Activity embedded in Settings app on large screen devices.

name: ACTION_SHOW_REGULATORY_INFO
action: Show the regulatory information screen for the device.

name: ACTION_SOUND_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of sound and volume.

name: ACTION_SHOW_WORK_POLICY_INFO
action: Show Work Policy info. DPC apps can implement an activity that handles this intent in order to show device policies associated with the work profile or managed device.

name: ACTION_STORAGE_VOLUME_ACCESS_SETTINGS
action: Activity Action: Show screen for controlling which apps have access on volume directories.

name: ACTION_SYNC_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of sync settings.

name: ACTION_USAGE_ACCESS_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to control access to usage information.

name: ACTION_USER_DICTIONARY_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to manage the user input dictionary.

name: ACTION_VOICE_CONTROL_AIRPLANE_MODE
action: Modify Airplane mode settings using a voice command. This intent MUST be started using startVoiceActivity.

name: ACTION_VOICE_CONTROL_BATTERY_SAVER_MODE
action: Modify Battery Saver mode setting using a voice command. This intent MUST be started using startVoiceActivity.

name: ACTION_VOICE_CONTROL_DO_NOT_DISTURB_MODE
action: Modify do not disturb mode settings. This intent MUST be started using startVoiceActivity.

name: ACTION_VOICE_INPUT_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to configure input methods, in particular allowing the user to enable input methods.

name: ACTION_VPN_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of VPN.

name: ACTION_VR_LISTENER_SETTINGS
action: Show VR listener settings.

name: ACTION_WEBVIEW_SETTINGS
action: Allows user to select current webview implementation.

name: ACTION_WIFI_ADD_NETWORKS
action: Show setting page to process the addition of Wi-Fi networks to the user's saved network list. The app should send a new intent with an extra that holds a maximum of five WifiNetworkSuggestion that specify credentials for the networks to be added to the user's database. The Intent should be sent via the Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int) API.

name: ACTION_WIFI_IP_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of a static IP address for Wi-Fi.

name: ACTION_WIFI_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of Wi-Fi.

name: ACTION_WIRELESS_SETTINGS
action: Show settings to allow configuration of wireless controls such as Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and Mobile networks.

name: ACTION_ZEN_MODE_PRIORITY_SETTINGS
action: Show Zen Mode (aka Do Not Disturb) priority configuration settings.
